description: Stop Sharbel trading immediately. Do not execute next trade until infrastructure issues are resolved.
reason: Config update mechanism is completely broken (13+ failed reversion orders over 96 hours). Duplicate logging bug is systematic and corrupting data integrity. These are not operational issues—they are infrastructure failures that make the bot unreliable.

description: Hard-code stake limit to $2 maximum in bot source code. Do not use configuration files or soft rules. This must be a code-level constraint that cannot be overridden by config.

description: Investigate why bot is ignoring config updates. Check: (1) Is bot caching config at startup? (2) Is there a stale config file being read? (3) Is there a race condition between config reads and writes? (4) Are reversion orders being logged but not executed?
reason: 13+ reversion orders issued and logged but all ignored by bot. This indicates either config caching, stale file reads, or a disconnect between logging and execution. Must be fixed before resuming trading.
